mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import re
import heapq

def most_frequent_words(paragraph):
    words = re.findall('', paragraph.lower())
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return [word for (word, _) in heapq.nsmallest(5, word_count.items(), key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word, _ in heapq.nsmallest(5, word_count.items(), key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for (word, _) in heapq.nsmallest(6, word_count.items(), key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))]
